rules:
    components-parameters-camel-case:
        description: All parameter names should be lowerCamelCase
        message: {{value}} is not lowerCamelCase. {{description}}. Fix by renaming the parameter, eg. ParameterName -> parameterName.
        given: $.components.parameters..[?(@.in==='query' || @.in==='path' || @.in==='cookie')]
        severity: warn
            field: name
            function: casing
                type: camel
